description: A JSON Schema for the trip report on https://www.allstate.com/landingpages/drivewisedevice.aspx

timestamp.description: Timestamp in GMT (Greenwich Mean Time) at trip start and trip end.

timezone.description: Time zone at trip start used to convert trips to local time.

hypermiling.description: Indicator suggesting that hyper-miling took place.

avgspeed.description: Average speed while the vehicle is in motion (not including 0 mph).

sec_in_band.description: Seconds driven in speed bands (each band is 10 mph up to 120 mph).

anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

miles_in_time_range.description: Miles driven in each time range (each time range is 1 hour totaling 24 ranges).

anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

const_speed_miles_in_band.description: Constant speed mile driven in speed bands (each band is 10 mph up to 120 mph).

anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

vary_speed_miles_in_band.description: Varying speed miles driven in speed bands (each band is 10 mph up to 120 mph).

anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

sec_decel.description: Seconds driven during deceleration in 1 mph/s bands up to 10 mph/s.

anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

sec_accel.description: Seconds driven during acceleration in 1 mph/s bands up to 10 mph/s.

anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

braking.description: Count of occurrences braking more than 10 seconds in 6 bands over 6 mph/s.

anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

accel.description: Count of occurrences accelerating more than 10 seconds in 6 bands over 6 mph/s.

anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

orientation.description: Accelerometer orientation flag - indicating whether the device oriented with vehicle.

small_speed_var.description: Miles driven with small speed variation in 13 individual 5 mph bands.

anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

large_speed_var.description: Miles driven with larger speed variation in 13 individual 5 mph bands

anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

accel_decel.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

speed_changes.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.
